trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.WSFederationAuthenticationModule.RedirectingToIdentityProvider> event is raised before the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.WSFederationAuthenticationModule> redirects the request to the identity provider.
You can access and modify the request through the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.RedirectingToIdentityProviderEventArgs.SignInRequestMessage%2A> property.

For example, you can modify the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.FederationMessage.BaseUri%2A> property in the sign-in message to change the identity provider to which the request will be redirected.
Initializes an instance of the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Services.RedirectingToIdentityProviderEventArgs"></xref> class by using the specified WS-Federation Passive Sign-in message.

The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.RedirectingToIdentityProviderEventArgs.SignInRequestMessage%2A> property in the new instance is initialized to the value of the `signInRequestMessage` parameter.
The WS-Federation Passive Sign-in message that will be used to redirect the user to the Identity Provider.
Gets or sets the WS-Federation Passive Sign-in message that will be used to redirect the user to the identity provider.
You can change properties of the sign-in message to modify the request.

For example, you can modify the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.FederationMessage.BaseUri%2A> property in the sign-in message to change the identity provider to which the request will be redirected.
The WS-Federation Sign-in message that will be used to redirect the user to the identity provider.
An attempt to set the property to <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> occurs.
